Hi

Are there any updates on the progress of Heritrix's multi-machine
crawl=
 support? The release notes for 1.8.0 suggest that support has
been improve=
d, as do the comments on the mailing list regarding hcc.

I haven't managed=
 to find information on actually running a
multimachine crawl, though. Does=
 anyone have any links or suggestions?

Thanks

Greg
